item.description:
Hey Everyone,

The Federal Election is taking place on Monday and the Canadian Consulate has invited us to watch the results and discuss the current state of Canadian Politics. Please RSVP so I can add your name to the list. Due to security concerns only confirmed people will be allowed in the consulate. Business Casual.

We will be meeting at Solas Bar on Monday evening at 8 PM and walk over together.

Thanks and I hope to see you on Monday!

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: Please check in with security in the main level of Copley Place
item.why: Find out who will win the federal election. Will Stephen Harper return as prime minister or will Jack Payton and the NDP's make a big surprise? Come out on Monday and find out!

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Canadian Election Night Reception at Consulate
